explains: n. 药量过多；（有害物）过量
v. 服药过量，给……服药过量
wordGroup: drug overdose 药物过量；服药过量

sentences.en: She took a massive overdose of sleeping pills.
sentences.cn: 她服用了过量的安眠药。

sentences.en: Each year, one in 100 girls ages 15-19 takes an overdose.
sentences.cn: 每年，100个15至19岁的女孩中就有１个用药过量。

sentences.en: Whatever happens, never take an overdose of this medicine.
sentences.cn: 这种药千万不能服过量。
